::Shadow Wing::

She went to her quarters and slammed the door shut to her room.  "If 
he expects me to take that lightly?" she fumed around her room for a 
while.  She was mad.  She had tried to help him and he totaly blew 
her off.  She had help her hand out to help and he slapped it away. 
She threw her fist into a wall as hard as she could.  She was livid 
with him.  She hit the wall again and again.  She sat on the edge of 
her bed and watched her nuckles turn black and blue.  Then she had a 
nice thought.  She remembered that tomorrow she was to go sparring 
with Lunarpine.
"I'll get that ego inflated flea bag tomorrow. And I know just how to 
do it."
She grabbed her small sachel and walked out of her room.
She transformed into her owl mode and flew off in the opposite 
direction of Lunarpine.  She went to a small creek and gathered up a 
few stones.  The largest ones that she could lift with her beak and 
put them in her sachel.  When the sachel was full, she flew back to 
the base.  She transformed into bot mode and walked to her room with 
the sack full of rocks and closed her room door behind her.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> (Getting ready 4 the sparring match?)
> 
> Lunarpine stared up at the sky, it was beautifully lit through the 
> trees. he needed a rest. his adrenaline was flowing from the 
> explosion and the argument. he tried to pick up Megatrons trail but 
> lost the scent when Megs left the treeline. the rest wasn't hard to 
> follow. broken branches, downed trees, and burn marks on the ground 
> made it obvious where Megs had been and he wasn't here now so 
> Lunarpine found a nice place to curl up. He had to rest, he had a 
> sparring session in the morning. He knew that shadow Wing wouldn't 
be 
> such an easy target this time.
>
